text.0: that general car of yours invoked by many a man that comes to our libations threewheeled meet for lauds.
text.1: that circumambient car worthy of sacrifice we call with our pure hymns at earliest flush of dawn.
text.2: ye o nāsatyas mount that earlyharnessed car that travels early laden with its freight of balm.
text.3: wherewith ye heroes visit clans who sacrifice even the poor mans worship where the priest attends.
text.4: if to the deft adhvaryu with the meath in hand or to the kindler firm in strength the household friend.
text.5: or to the sages poured libations ye approach come thence o aśvins now to drink the offered meath.
